metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Production orders manually created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders manually created") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders created for sales order
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Production orders created for sales order") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders without planned order reference
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders without planned order reference") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders created earlier than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders created earlier than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders created later than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders created later than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders released early
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders released early") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders released late
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders released late") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders with missing parts
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders with missing parts") * 100

metrics.name: Unreleased production orders with overdue scheduled release
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Unreleased production orders with overdue scheduled release") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders confirmed late
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders confirmed late") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders with confirmation errors during goods movement
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders with confirmation errors during goods movement") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders not finally confirmed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Production orders not finally confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders delivered late
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders delivered late") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders with expected scrap
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Production orders with expected scrap") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered production orders without 'Delivery completed' set
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivered production orders without 'Delivery completed' set") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered production orders with goods receipt into quality inspection
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivered production orders with goods receipt into quality inspection") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered production orders with inspection lot from goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivered production orders with inspection lot from goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders with inspection lot with outstanding stock posting
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders with inspection lot with outstanding stock posting") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered production orders with goods receipt into unrestricted-use stock
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivered production orders with goods receipt into unrestricted-use stock") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders not (fully) delivered but technically completed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Production orders not (fully) delivered but technically completed") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders overdue for technical completion by more than 30 days
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production orders overdue for technical completion by more than 30 days") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders released (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Production orders released") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders released (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Production orders released")

metrics.name: Production orders initially confirmed (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Production orders initially confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders initially confirmed (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Production orders initially confirmed")

metrics.name: Production orders delivered (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Production orders delivered") * 100

metrics.name: Production orders delivered (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Production orders delivered")

metrics.name: Delivered production orders technically completed (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Delivered production orders technically completed") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered production orders technically completed (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Delivered production orders technically completed")

metrics.name: Create production order with reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create production order with reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create production order without reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create production order without reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release production order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release production order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Initially confirm production order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Initially confirm production order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Finally confirm production order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Finally confirm production order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Deliver production order to unrestricted stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Deliver production order to unrestricted stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Deliver production order to quality inspection stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Deliver production order to quality inspection stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Deliver production order - others
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Deliver production order - others')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Set fully/partly not delivered production order to technically completed
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Set fully/partly not delivered production order to technically completed')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Set fully/partly delivered production order to technically completed
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Set fully/partly delivered production order to technically completed')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
